page.title: 02St. Augustines
page.content: {St. Augustines}school is built beside the church. The school is a mixture of infants and juniors and a nursery class. The old school and the church were built in 1873. The school we are in now was built in 1937. everybody brought a penny to school to pay for a brick.All the children and teachers go into church for services sometimes. It is getting a new roof now because the old one was rotten. There is a{Kestrel}nesting on the church, behind a statue of a saint. The church is famous because it was designed by a famous architect called {George Frederick Bodley.}People come from all over the world to look at it. There was another famous building called the{Acme mill}next to the school.An artist called{L.S.Lowry}used to paint it but it was demolished two years ago.
